name: Fragmental (itch)
description:
A  game where you must repair your robot friends to solve Portal-inspired puzzles!

- Move with WASD / Arrow keys 

- Pick up parts with C 

- Activate each robot's special ability with Spacebar 

- Control the camera with Q and E

- Try stacking 3 parts of the same color!

Game made in 24h for the "Global Game Jam" contest

Art:

  •    André Nogueira
  •    Tiago Silva

  Programming:

  •    João "Watson" Dias
